about_the_game:
Relive the past and discover the present.


6 years after Holly moved away from Olive Bay, she is contacted by her former best friend and romantic partner Bede, who wishes to reconnect with her. The two once imagined a life together, but parted on painful terms.

Despite her apprehension, the allure of the past and her affection for Bede compels her to return to her home town, where she hopes they can finally live out their dreams together.

Gameplay Features:

  • Short, intimate story; Inspired by real life experiences and locations (average playtime: 3 hours)
  • Narrative-driven gameplay: explore Olive Bay in the past and the present as the timelines blur together
  • Fully interactive environment: plenty of characters to meet, locations around town to visit and secret collectables to discover.
  • Immersive maritime soundtrack: lead by Eli Rainsberry (No Longer Home, Wilmot’s Warehouse, A Monster’s Expedition)
  • And yes, surfing!

Relive the past and discover the present.


6 years after Holly moved away from Olive Bay, she is contacted by her former best friend and romantic partner Bede, who wishes to reconnect with her. The two once imagined a life together, but parted on painful terms.

Despite her apprehension, the allure of the past and her affection for Bede compels her to return to her home town, where she hopes they can finally live out their dreams together.

Gameplay Features:

  • Short, intimate story; Inspired by real life experiences and locations (average playtime: 3 hours)
  • Narrative-driven gameplay: explore Olive Bay in the past and the present as the timelines blur together
  • Fully interactive environment: plenty of characters to meet, locations around town to visit and secret collectables to discover.
  • Immersive maritime soundtrack: lead by Eli Rainsberry (No Longer Home, Wilmot’s Warehouse, A Monster’s Expedition)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10 or later
  • Processor: x64 architecture
  • Graphics: Graphics card with at least 500MB of memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Made With Unity

name: Surf Club

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: x64 architecture
  • Graphics: Graphics card with at least 500MB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Made With Unity

short_description: Surf Club is an adventure game about a young woman named Holly, who returns to her home town in the hope of rekindling an old relationship.
